wikipedia_page.main: Charles Town (born 1796 at Sutton Valence, Kent; died 31 July 1845 at Sandgate, Folkestone, Kent) was an English amateur cricketer who played first-class cricket from 1815 to 1823.  Mainly associated with Kent, he made 3 known appearances in first-class matches.

response: Charlestown or Charles Town may refer to:
*Charleston, South Carolina, called Charles Town from its founding in 1680 until 1783
*Charles Town, West Virginia, called Charlestown before West Virginia became a state; renamed to avoid confusion with the state capital, Charleston.
